TextLibrary.Text: Jarl
Jotun
Greetings, Jotun. I had forgotten the sulfuric stench that follows you everywhere you go.
Greetings, Jotun. I had forgotten the sulfuric stench that follows you everywhere you go.
Greetings, Jotun. I had forgotten the sulfuric stench that follows you everywhere you go.
Greetings, Jotun. I had forgotten the sulfuric stench that follows you everywhere you go.
And Greetings to you, Jarl. I had forgotten how ugly you were.
And Greetings to you, Jarl. I had forgotten how ugly you were.
And Greetings to you, Jarl. I had forgotten how ugly you were.
And Greetings to you, Jarl. I had forgotten how ugly you were.
So we agree? Nothing more will be stolen.
So we agree? Nothing more will be stolen.
So we agree? Nothing more will be stolen.
So we agree? Nothing more will be stolen.
The Helm and Boots you stole from me were worthless anyway.
The Helm and Boots you stole from me were worthless anyway.
The Helm and Boots you stole from me were worthless anyway.
The Helm and Boots you stole from me were worthless anyway.
Then throw them away! The Hammer and Cloak you stole were worth even less.
Then throw them away! The Hammer and Cloak you stole were worth even less.
Then throw them away! The Hammer and Cloak you stole were worth even less.
Then throw them away! The Hammer and Cloak you stole were worth even less.
I will throw mine away, but only if you throw yours away too.
I will throw mine away, but only if you throw yours away too.
I will throw mine away, but only if you throw yours away too.
I will throw mine away, but only if you throw yours away too.
Bah! It is all junk. We will give it to the Human. She can take it away and dispose of it all.
Bah! It is all junk. We will give it to the Human. She can take it away and dispose of it all.
Bah! It is all junk. We will give it to the Human. He can take it away and dispose of it all.
Bah! It is all junk. We will give it to the Human. He can take it away and dispose of it all.
Good. It is done! Now I can get away from your ugly face!
Good. It is done! Now I can get away from your ugly face!
Good. It is done! Now I can get away from your ugly face!
Good. It is done! Now I can get away from your ugly face!
And I can return home to some clean air.
And I can return home to some clean air.
And I can return home to some clean air.
And I can return home to some clean air.
